DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to determine if a school-based multi-session group smoking cessation program is more effective than a single session group program.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Adolescent Smoking Cessation Programs
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators reformatted two group smoking cessation programs (the NOT program of the American Lung Association and Kicking Butts), both of which involve 50 minute sessions delivered once weekly, into a program that could be delivered during school lunch periods (25-30 minutes) twice weekly. Smoking status was subsequently assessed over the 12 month period following the intervention,
DOC.criteria: Students who indicated they smoked cigarettes and wanted to quit Students referred as part of a disciplinary requirement to stop smoking
